title: The Acropolis Visit
text: Must visit. It is a worth it visit. Better do it when in a warm weather. Try to visit early in the morning so you avoid the crowd and enjoy the scenes.

title: Amazing PLAKA
text: It was really awesome visiting PLAKA. Good restaurants, professional hospitality, clean area, everybody is friendly, local designerâ€™s work is a piece of art. PLAKA is a safe area that you can visit anytime and spend a full day in it, to enjoy shopping, interacting with the locals and moving around its amazing charming streets

title: My Wellness trip
text: I went to Istanbul aiming to spend my birthday in this charming city. My experience with all the details was amazing. Conrad, was a perfect choice for my trip, all the details at the hotel are of high quality. I highly recomendcit
